Jackson.South Side High School (Jackson, Tenness: South Side High School in Jackson, Tennessee is a public high school, part of the Madison County, Tennessee school system. It was created in 1956 by the consolidation of Pinson High School, Malesus High School, J.B. Young High School and Mercer High School. In 1992 they absorbed the students of West High School (Jackson, Tennessee) when it was abolished as part of the merger of the Jackson and Madison County school systems.
